Wave of Dread.name: Wave of Dread
Wave of Dread.fullText:
Phantasm Guard Attack 11Wave of Dread

With a wave of your sword, a cloud of ghostly hands and wailing heads swarms out over your enemies, chilling them to the bone.

Encounter        Arcane, Fear, Illusion, Implement, Psychic
Standard Action      Close blast 3

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will

Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 59.
Wave of Dread.flavor: With a wave of your sword, a cloud of ghostly hands and wailing heads swarms out over your enemies, chilling them to the bone.
Wave of Dread.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Illusory Host.name: Illusory Host
Illusory Host.fullText:
Phantasm Guard Attack 20Illusory Host

A horde of ghostly figures appears around you to act at your command, menacing your enemies with a field of blades and claws.

Daily        Arcane, Illusion, Implement, Psychic, Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will

Hit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Effect: The burst creates a zone of ghostly warriors that lasts until the end of the encounter. Enemies within the zone grant combat advantage, and you can use the Illusory Host Attack power at will.


Illusory Host Attack

Daily      Arcane, Illusion, Implement, Psychic, Zone
Opportunity Action  

Requirement: The power Illusory Host must be active in order to use this power.

Trigger: An enemy in the zone shifts or makes an attack that does not include you as a target.

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will

Hit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you mark the target until the end of its next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 60.
Illusory Host.flavor: A horde of ghostly figures appears around you to act at your command, menacing your enemies with a field of blades and claws.
Illusory Host.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you mark the target until the end of its next turn.
Illusory Host.effect: The burst creates a zone of ghostly warriors that lasts until the end of the encounter. Enemies within the zone grant combat advantage, and you can use the Illusory Host Attack power at will.
Illusory Host.requirement: The power Illusory Host must be active in order to use this power.
Illusory Host.trigger: An enemy in the zone shifts or makes an attack that does not include you as a target.

Nightmare Landscape.name: Nightmare Landscape
Nightmare Landscape.fullText:
Phantasm Guard Utility 12Nightmare Landscape

The world darkens and warps. Bushes and trees seem to cling at your enemies, and the earth melts and rises up to engulf their feet.

Daily        Arcane, Illusion, Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Effect: The burst creates a zone of illusory nightmare terrain that lasts until the end of the encounter. Enemies treat squares within the zone as difficult terrain, and allies within the zone gain concealment.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 59.
Nightmare Landscape.flavor: The world darkens and warps. Bushes and trees seem to cling at your enemies, and the earth melts and rises up to engulf their feet.
Nightmare Landscape.effect: The burst creates a zone of illusory nightmare terrain that lasts until the end of the encounter. Enemies treat squares within the zone as difficult terrain, and allies within the zone gain concealment.
